response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $900,000. My objective is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, hence the carefully considered figure. I believe this offer strikes a balance between reflecting the true worth of the product and providing you with an exceptional value. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
